overview: After watching some stand-up comedy, Craig, his friends and the comedians have a drink. While in the bathroom, a man sits in Craig's chair. He behaves inappropriately to the point that Scott has to ask him to leave. Things look like they're going to end in a fight, but then they don't. Craig reflects on how meaningless this interaction was.
tagline: On the 27th of February, 2017, a man sat down with some comedians. What followed was not funny.
title: Stand Up (Or 3 1/2)
